issues.description: The problem specification (UML and textual instructions) defines orderMeal(Meal) as a void method, but in the solution it is implemented as public boolean orderMeal(Meal). This return-type mismatch could confuse students and break tests expecting a void signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the signature of orderMeal in SealSaloon.java to return void (public void orderMeal(Meal meal)) and remove the boolean return statements to align with the problem specification.
